data.expected_result: Your device would correct the message and you would exit the channel topic menu without crashing.
data.short_description: Device crashes when saving a channel topic while your device is trying to correct a word you misspelt.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel then click to change the topic. - Type something that you know your device will want to correct, (e.g. something spelt similar to hey but not an actual word) - Make sure the little blue correction box is still onscreen, then click save & observe.
